titleInfo.title: Letter from William Lockyer Merewether to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding information on Sir Henry Bartle Edward Frere and the proceeedings of the Sind Irregular Horse which Pelly had requested; his experiences with the commission (on the re-organisation of the Indian Army); and his beliefs on their intentions for governing India.The letter concludes with Merewether's thoughts on John Jacob's attitude to religion.
